website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek probiotics as well as a colon detox. This system promotes weight loss and also improves the body's absorption of other vitamins and medications.
pros: Only two capsules required per day
Very effective on stomach bloating and cramping
Overall increases in energy are common praises
cons: Heart patients should use caution, can throw PVCs
Suggested dose may not be effective

customer_reviews.title: needed function
customer_reviews.text: Just started using product, started working the next morning after taking before bedtime. For me (someone else may be different), they didn't cause a "hurry up or you are going to mess your pants;" but when it was time, I needed to head to the right direction. VERY MILD and intermittent cramps on more than one occasion. Nothing unbearable....so far, I am really pleased with the product. Am into my 7th day of use.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Good but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked really well. Definitely had me going. The only problem I had with it ,is that it gave me bad cramp or stomach pain . Sometimes it was almost unbearable. like I had to take a walk or sit down to alleviate the pain but when I got everything it was pushing out of me , then it was all good. I'd probably try it again but I'll give another colon cleanse a shot first. I don't mind drowning the toilet but the pain has to go!
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Bho

customer_reviews.title: Abdominal pain, extreme fatigue
customer_reviews.text: While this cleanse did "cleanse" my bowels, I experienced moderate-severe abdominal pain and nausea a few hours after I took the pills. The intolerable side effects were extreme fatigue and malaise. I don't want to go through a cleanse if I feel sick to my stomach and have no energy to get out of bed. I even tried cutting down to just 1 capsule at bedtime, but it made no difference. I discontinued the cleanse after 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best product. Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I took this colon cleanse product for a week. Works so great. I think one week is enough for me, can't do more than. Keep another 15 pills for the next clean. :) Take 2 pills before bedtime. Drink a lot of water. Flushing out fast in the next morning. Feeling so fresh :) Don't forget to drink a lot of water!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady MeowMeow

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: This product tears up your stomach! Followed direction, drank plenty of water and doubled over in pain! One day 4 and it's worse every day.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a few days now, and it works great! I'll recommend it to friends.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from constipation and have had to rely on eating lots of papaya and taking cascara sagrada and drinking lots of water and eating fiber. All that helps but I still suffer from constipation. This product when taken at night will make you go the next morning. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure many work having said that I absolutely love this one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of the detox products. I am not sure many work having said that I absolutely love this one. I feel clean after the 15 days, my skins better, my stomach is flatter.
